quoteText:
We strongly recommend that you read their privacy policies and terms and conditions of use to understand how they collect, use, and share information.
We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content on the websites of third party sites.
title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that in regard to links to and from third party websites, "We strongly recommend that you read their privacy policies and terms and conditions of use to understand how they collect, use, and share information. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content on the websites of third party sites."
